title: 02: Natural Agriculture, CSAs, urban salads and ex-addicts
subtitle: 02: Natural Agriculture, CSAs, urban salads and ex-addicts
summary: In the second episode of Farmerama, Nigel, Jo and Abby take a close look at Natural Agriculture after a visit to the Shumei farm near Yatesbury. They also investigate some of the ways farms are trying to get local communities more interested in growing and farming. There's a visit to a CSA farm near Swansea, a community garden in midlands, and an urban farm in Bristol.
